website_summaries.verdict: Whether looking for a front or back office printer, this 9-pin model provides quality results without breaking the bank.
pros: Prints quickly, up to 347 characters per second
Energy efficient and uses less power than some similar models
Includes a USB port so remote printing can be set up
Fairly quiet for a dot matrix printer
Can print out invoices in triplicate
cons: Doesn't work as well printing graphic content and forms as it does standard, text-based documents

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer to fill out carbon copy preprinted work orders for my automotive shop. I have never had a problem with it. Ink ribbon is very easy to change, and it's also very easy to load paper.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Dot matrix printer yay! Free at last!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, for a 9-pin, the print quality is fine. I've been using inkjet printers for years and years and always hated them. The expensive ink cartridges that never last and dry up drove me crazy. So nice to have a ribbon printer again. I feel liberated by this little dot matrix printer. See the video I uploaded. The tractor feed mechanism is fine. Seems to be a good little printer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Swann

customer_reviews.title: Awful print quality but a breeze to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible printer for quality print but sets up perfectly with Sage50 accounting software. I only use it to print continuous form checks. No other dot matrix printer seems to work with Sage50 and Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: emklees

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste time or money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Tries many different things but print quality was terrible so i had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: It didn't come with an instruction booklet & we can't ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with an instruction booklet & we can't get this to work continuously. Even using youtube we can't get the paper to line up correctly so that it will keep printing from page to page. Anyone able to help?
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McGill

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, it does a good job. Use it to print invoices (3 part carbonless) It replaced a printer just like it, it worked (still working) for 10 years, but the 3 page was getting too lite to read. Hope this printer last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Q

customer_reviews.title: ......print......print....
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointing overall. But it prints. Be nice to have the option to condense.
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Canterbury

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work right
customer_reviews.text: This is a secondary printer, which is only used once in awhile. At first it was working then into the 5th month its off center and only works when it wants to. It's still like brand new but of course it can not be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It actually works very well .. and we use it a lot .. gonna get another one .. cause my other one is 40 years old .
customer_reviews.author: Avery Pinao Co.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is exactly what I have been looking for. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A Jaye

customer_reviews.title: YES! Works with MacOSX
customer_reviews.text: Nice small dot matrix printer, cheap to maintain. Works perfectly with MacOSX, choose this driver: Epson 9-pin printer.
customer_reviews.author: Ingo 11

product_meta.title: Epson C11CC24001 LX-350 Dot Matrix Printer - 9 pin - Up to 347 char/sec - Parallel/Serial/USB
feature_bullets: The Epson LX-350 has fast and durable EPSON 9-Pin technology, prints up to 347 cps and is ideal for front and back office applications needing continuous paper or multi-part stationery
Compact design fits neatly onto desks
High reliability: MTBF of 10,000 operating hours
Energy efficient model for less power consumption
